meanings.sent1: The peskiest mosquito kept buzzing around my head.
meanings.sent2: The peskiest part of the homework was the confusing math problems.
meanings.sent3: The peskiest squirrel in the park stole all the picnic snacks!
meanings.sent4: Her peskiest habit was leaving dirty dishes in the sink for days.
meanings.sent5: The peskiest sound in the library was the loud sneezing.

meanings.sent1: The peskiest traffic jam made me late for work.
meanings.sent2: Her peskiest habit was interrupting others while they spoke.
meanings.sent3: The peskiest rainstorm flooded the streets and caused chaos.
meanings.sent4: The peskiest knot in the shoelace refused to come undone.
meanings.sent5: The peskiest alarm clock woke me up too early every morning.

meanings.sent1: The peskiest customer at the store complained about everything.
meanings.sent2: The peskiest part of the project was dealing with constant changes.
meanings.sent3: The peskiest cat in the neighborhood kept sneaking into our garden.
meanings.sent4: The peskiest stain on the shirt wouldn't come out no matter what.
meanings.sent5: The peskiest noise in the house was the dripping faucet at night.
